name: Freecell Solitaire ◇
description:
This brand new fully featured Freecell Solitaire by Banana & Co is the best card game you will ever play! From the amazing Live Backgrounds and Daily Challenges to the classic intuitive gameplay, we promise the most robust and satisfying Freecell Solitaire experience you will find anywhere.

Relax with a game at home, during your busy commute to work, or on the plane. Unlimited winning deals ensures you will never run out of interesting games to exercise your brain. The best part is that it is free to play.

The best looking Freecell Solitaire on the store, we are sure you will agree with us.
- Live Backgrounds provide wonderfully relaxing ambient animations.
- Beautifully crafted themes.
- Fun and dynamic win animations.
- Tons of art customizations from card backs to suit styles, to foundation art and so much more.
- Set the background to dozens of different colors to suit your mood.

Customize your play style.
- Hints assist when you are stuck.
- Unlimited undos.
- Statistics tracker records your play style and history.
- Portrait and Landscape support.
- Help screen if you are unfamiliar with the rules of Freecell.

Daily Challenges - A different challenge every day.
- Complete unique challenges each day.
- Earn bronze, silver, and gold trophies.
- Play past challenges if you missed a day.
- Unlock and master achievements for an even deeper play experience.

If you have ever played Solitaire, also known as Patience or Klondike, you will feel right at home. We set out to make the best Freecell Solitaire available and we hope you enjoy it.
publishers: The Solitaire, Mahjong and Sudoku Company
